question.title: Will at least one film surpass US$1 billion in worldwide box office before May 1, 2026?
question.description:
This tracks whether a global blockbuster emerges in early 2026, which is informative about theatrical demand, franchise strength, and international market performance. See for example Screen Rant: [The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Just Convinced Me It’ll Beat The $1.3B Original](https://screenrant.com/super-mario-galaxy-movie-box-office-billion-original-prediction/)

`{"format":"bot_tournament_question","info":{"hash_id":"2948817ca7bb3170","sheet_id":267.1}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question resolves to Yes if, before May 1, 2026, Box Office Mojo lists at least one film with a worldwide box office gross of at least US$1,000,000,000 earned in 2026. This question resolves to no if Box Office Mojo lists no film meeting that box office threshold before May 1, 2026. The primary source is Box Office Mojo’s 2026 worldwide box office page: https://www.boxofficemojo.com/year/world/2026/
question.fine_print:
Use the Worldwide gross as shown on Box Office Mojo. If Box Office Mojo is unavailable, use The Numbers as a backup: https://www.the-numbers.com/box-office-records/worldwide/all-movies/cumulative/all-time
 .
question.short_title: Will at least one film surpass US$1 billion in worldwide box office before May 1, 2026?
